formattedAddress: 1844 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10031, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1844 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10031, USA

originalText.text: Loved the cake made for my husbands 50th birthday party. I got a two tier cake and two dozen cupcakes. Wonderful customer service and reliable delivery. I was in awe at the ease of how ordering went. I was most impressed that I was able to communicate with a person rather than filling out a form online.  I will def order again when I need a cake. All the cupcakes got swooped up so fast I didnt even get a chance to have any.

originalText.text: Wayne was amazing he really went above and beyond for this cake and it came out so beautifully way more then I could ever imagine!! Also the cake was delicious and we all enjoyed it so much what a hit at this party!! Thank you for going above and beyond!

text.text: Wayne was amazing he really went above and beyond for this cake and it came out so beautifully way more then I could ever imagine!! Also the cake was delicious and we all enjoyed it so much what a hit at this party!! Thank you for going above and beyond!

originalText.text: The cake was THE highlight of my daughter's 4th birthday!   And the cake... this red velvet was literally THE best, red velvet cake that I have ever eaten.  I wasn't even a red velvet fan before, and this cake changed my mind. So moist, so scrumptious, perfect cake.  Even the cream cheese frosting was exquisite.  The cake was also beautifully decorated, with my requests beautifully executed.   Everybody at the party was talking about how delicious it was and wanted to know where I got it.  The owner/ chef Wayne was so helpful & responsive, even instructing us how to best keep the cake cold for serving.  I highly recommend this bakery.  I will be coming here for my future birthday cakes.  The only problem --- there were NO leftovers for me to take homeü§£!  I guess that's my excuse to stop by the bakery for a slice!!!

originalText.text: Everyone enjoyed this strawberry short cake with a chocolate layer. It was moist, great flavor, strawberries were fresh! Unbelievably good! The Birthday girl was floored and couldn‚Äôt stop raving about this cake; going back for seconds. Everyone asked, ‚ÄúWhere did you get this cake from!?‚Äù I am so impressed this was my first time ordering a customized cake, and won‚Äôt be my last. Such a great experience! thanks to the reviews I went right up the block and around the corner. Love knowing this Black owned business is right in my neighborhood. I dont have to go far to get great pastries! 5 stars!

originalText.text:
Cake Lords Bakery does AMAZING work!!!!! I live in Florida and Wayne worked patiently  with me for my mom's birthday celebration from establishing the look and flavor of 1 cake to providing guidance for set up. He really went out of his way to ensure I had everything covered. Based on his help and support from afar, I ended up ordering 2 separate cakes as well as additional treats for a dessert table. He was able to create 2 beautiful works of art that amazed everyone at the party. Each cake looked so realistic. And the TASTE!!!!!!!! Both of the cakes were red velvet and were not too heavy on the cocoa, so perfect for us. The treats were very pretty and tasted fresh.

Don't go anywhere else in Harlem for your cakes but Cake Lords. We will be ordering from them again, next time we're in NY.
